RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KORAL speed, drift in, best. DUCHECK JQM hard fought loss. CADDO LIGHTS fought gamely. J BEST PLEASURE alter path, late kick. LUXURY PAINT solid effort. TECOLOTE DASH no impact.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 870 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 10500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUNCHED led, dueled turn, prevailed. BAKERSFIELD BABE steadied slightly quarter pole, game second. JUSTIN SPEIGHT brief foot, dueled turn, no kick. RIGHT TO SUE chased leaders. HIGH ON CUERVO four wide turn, tired. DEL ARGENT forced out, wide trip. EZ GUESS off step slow, drifted out turn, no factor. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF BAKERSFIELD BABE CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF LAUNCHED FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE QUARTER POLE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Justin Speight
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, dueled turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ez Guess
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, drifted out turn, no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR COLORADO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECIAL TWIST rushed up to vie for the lead from the inside then took lead at the quarter pole and drew clear. LUNA ROSE stalked the pace from three wide and showed late effort to improve position. LOTTA PRADA went to the front to set a pressured pace to the quarter pole and weakened. BRING THE POSSE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Special Twist
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, vied inside, led 1/4, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, late effort, improved position

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCKYMOUNTAINTWIST tracked the leaders through the turn while racing four wide, made a late rally in the stretch to be up in the final yards. TOO LATE sprinted to a clear lead to set the pace, was tiring in the stretch drive and drifted out late but held on to be second best. BEE EXXTRAVAGANT pressed the pace from the inside to the nine sixteenths pole then settled off the pace around the turn, went two or three wide in the stretch drive but was pushed out late but fought gamely. EUSEBIO stalked the pace from three wide but lacked the late response and faded. CLAIMJUMPER was allowed to settle at the back then made a rail bid on the turn but was not a threat. ORDER OF THE DAY settled near the back and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Exxtravagant
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, settle off pace, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Too Late
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, set pace, drifted out, tired, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Claimjumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rail bid turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockymountaintwist
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4wtrip, late rally, up final yds

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYNTER'S BOY saved ground through the turn then moved out to six wide in upper stretch and made a late rally to just get up for the win. DIVINE TASK raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then moved up from three wide around the turn, tipped out to four wide in upper stretch and took the lead in the final seventy yard but was nailed. MUCHO GIFTED hustled to pressed the pace from the inside to deep stretch and took a brief lead in the final sixteenth but was outfinished. BIG BIZ was away alertly to a pressured pace from the two path to the deep stretch then was collared in the final sixteenth and gave way grudgingly. WEBCAM stalked the pace from three wide to the top of the stretch and fought gamely to deep stretch and weakened. MCORO rushed up to be off the pace through the turn but was not a factor. POLICY LIMIT trailed the field, distanced and was eased.

ENTRY.NAME: McOro
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Barton Ranch Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, off pace, no factor,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: C. Kidder, N. Cole, B. Kidder & R. Kinder & E. Woolsey

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Task
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wturn, 4wupper, late lead, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Gifted
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, brief late lead, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Big Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressured pace, collared, gave way grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNPLUCKED GEM stalked the pace down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker, took the lead in mid turn and kept on to win going away. HERE AND VOW was off the pace on the inside to the quarter pole then moved out to three wide into the stretch and made a late run to be second best. STOLEN HALO rushed up to take the early pressured lead to mid turn then was overtaken and fought gamely to mid stretch and tired late. HEAR ME ROAR prompted the pace to the half mile marker and flattened out. AMBER WAVES raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground and passed tiring rivals. CREDIT CARD FRAUD was away alertly to have good early speed to mid turn and gave way. T R'S FIRST was squeezed at the start, trailed the field and had no impact. CRIMSON T. raced near the back and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Amber Waves
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, saved ground, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Here and Vow
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, 3wupper, late run, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Credit Card Fraud
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, brief speed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Unplucked Gem
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3wturn, led mid turn, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Stolen Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, gamely, tired late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 12500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THREE FOR THREE tracked the leaders from off the pace through the turn then moved out to three wide in the stretch and engaged the leader at the eighth pole, took the lead nearing the sixteenth pole, held off the late outside closer and just lasted. MY MAN BIGGIE was allowed to settle through the final turn the moved out to five wide at the top of the stretch to make a late rally and just missed. QUICKTRIP VAN went to the lead around the first turn then vied down the backstretch and reclaimed the lead at the three furlong marker and inched away but was overtaken at the eighth pole and gave way grudgingly. GUEST CHECK saved ground around the first turn and took the lead going into the backstretch then vied for the lead around the final turn but tired. TREASURE COAST was forwardly placed from three wide, made a mild bid on the backstretch and faltered. MORE ACTION was distanced, pulled up and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Three for Three
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, tracked leaders, engaged 1/8, led, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAROLYN'S WAY dueled for the lead from three wide, fought gamely in the stretch and just lasted. WHAT A WAY TO GO was within striking distance from three or four wide through the turn then moved out to six wide in upper stretch and made a late rally to just miss. SMART ACT dueled for the lead from two wide to the three furlong marker and flattened out but held on for the show. VALDINI raced back down the backstretch then moved up from between horses at the three furlong marker, tipped out to five wide in upper stretch and made a late run to just miss the show. MOBILEAGILEHOSTILE raced near the back early then made a four wide bid down the backstretch and kept on to engage the leader at the quarter pole, matched strides to eighth pole and weakened. EXODUS AND HOPE saved ground to no avail. POPS GIRL ALEXA dueled for the lead from the inside to the five sixteenths pole and tired. PASSION RIDE was off the pace early to the half mile marker and dropped back. GOSPEL FAITH was squeezed at the start while trying to buck and rider lost irons, walked off. AN INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE START OF THE RACE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW IT WAS DETERMINED THAT GOSPEL FAITH WAS THE CAUSE OF HER OWN ISSUES AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Exodus and Hope
ENTRY.OWNER: Haar Robert J and Hitt Joshua James

ENTRY.NAME: Valdini
ENTRY.COMMENT: back, between 3/8, 5wupper, late run, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Mobileagilehostile
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 4wbid, engage 1/4, stretch duel, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gospel Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, bucked, lost irons, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Act
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, 2w, flattened out, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Carolyn's Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, 3w, fought gamely, just lasted

ENTRY.NAME: What a Way to Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: striking distance, 3-4w, 6wupper, late rally, just missed,
